item.description:
Hello Canucks,

For November's meetup we'll be going to one of Boston's more traditional irish pubs. It's located in the market area. There should be some good live music too!

Please make sure you RSVP so we know how many people will be joining us.

Hope you can make it!

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing by the bar

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian November Meetup
